statements: DELETE FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE site_id = 1 AND test_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE bacteria_level > 3.5 AND water_ph < 6.0;
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE site_id = 1 AND test_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM water_quality_sites WHERE site_name = 'River A';
DELETE FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE testing_site = 'Site A' AND testing_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TestLimits WHERE result_id = 100 AND parameter_id = 1;
DELETE FROM TestResults WHERE testing_date < '2022-01-01' AND test_result > 5.0;
